H0.text: who did the dominican republic gain its independence from. Spain

H1.text: who did the dominican republic gain its independence from. France

H2.text: who did the dominican republic gain its independence from. United Kingdom

H3.text: who did the dominican republic gain its independence from. Haiti

A4.text: the Spanish colony of Santo Domingo, the predecessor of the Dominican Republic, also became independent from Spain in 1821 after more than 300 years of Spanish control

A5.text: the military prowess displayed by the Dominican army during the Dominican Restoration War forced Haiti to realize that the goal of conquering the Dominican Republic was unattainable, and it finally recognized Dominican independence in 1867
